Sure, I'd be happy to recommend some movies for you.
First up is 'The Swindle' (1997). This movie follows a group of car thieves who are trying to save their childhood orphanage. However, things take a turn when the thieves stumble into a murder plot and end up starring in a reality television show.
Another great option is 'Slither' (2006). This movie follows a group of friends who decide to go on a road trip together. However, as they travel deeper into the country, they begin to encounter strange occurrences that seem to be connected to some dark secret that was once hidden away from the world.

Based on the user's preferences, I would recommend "Die Hard 2" and "The Mechanic". 

"Die Hard 2" is a thrilling action movie that follows the story of John McClane as he tries to stop a group of rogue military operatives who have taken control of Los Angeles. 

"The Mechanic" is a gripping and intense psychological thriller that follows the story of an aging hitman named Harry who befriends a young man named Jake who wants to be a professional killer.
